pros: Time off, flexible hours, set own schedule, caring co-workers
cons: Training could improve, not much room for advancement

job_title: Registered Nurse, BSN in Savannah, GA
pros: Great if you are a patient.
cons: Employees are treated like crap, caustic management and only hires the pretty people for management positions. Secretive about basic info so even if there is nothing nefarious happening the way they operate they make it shady just by their actions and non disclosure of basic info. Angry and rude bosses and it gets covered up and they hold you hostage with all of their legal protections in place. Be careful what you sign and take copies of everything consult an attorney to protect yourself. Make recordings if necessary. They have been sued many times as you can tell by the amount of Cover their Bottoms documents they have you sign. Clique ish and trash talkers. Super unhealthy environment as an employee. Beware

review_title: Great place to work but don't come here for the money

well respected company

pros: It is an honor to be instrumental in providing the overall medical, psychological and spiritual care to our patients and families during end of life. Is truly the gift that keeps giving.
cons: The delivery of such an important service is self-limiting.

4. Excellent benefits including direct primary care.
cons: 1. Hospice is a calling but the work we can do can be emotionally draining.
